Just not enough patience

Okay. New Alloy cannon crushes incoming ships with MAss Drivers filled with explosive alloys.
Ok, i need you to alert the fleet,to,aim at this point on their hull.
Begin harvest of internal samples. Check for utility. Unit 4, run a recursive scan to track the basis of their random number generator, then have ours match.
\*Suddenly collapses\*

Medics, get sampa out of there NOW!

Alert the fleet and fire Alloy cannon at nearest ships.

\*Ships explode everywhere with the superior Alloy cannon.

(Doh!) Wakes up in the medical wards beside xannari's body, still out cold

Uhhhh...what happened?
[Resources from the Citadel interior are being processed aboard the Krynn ship. Nuax will be in hibernation for another 2.2 hours while regenerating]

\*Gets up from bed and goes over to Xannari's still body\*

Come on, Xannari...I freed the real you...come back to us...

\*decides that the one way to finally put a stop to the Krynn invasion to to attack the entire Krynn neural network and so, deciding that Xannari's body was still connected, somehow to the Krynn, use it as a back door to the network. Sampa's hands once again touches Xannari's forehead and goes into another trance and, once again, another barrier is formed to protect the two connected minds\*

> 
> [You ever played Super Paper Mario? If yes, remember the Sammer Kingdom Biggest troll in any game ever? When you enter it the second time after having the world consumed by the void, you walk through... Well, nothing. There's a few artifacts here and there, but it's mostly empty.
> 
> If you don't know, the Sammer Kingdom is a world close to the void. You are told to endure 100 fights with skilled warriors to gain the Pure Heart. However, after a tremble in the void, it expands further, and the world is mere minutes away from destruction. You encounter Mimi on the next gate, and after defeating her, you now make a mad run to the king's palace. You pass by each warrior, who are on the floor, equipped with the knowledge that their world is ending. The void grows, the world trembles, and all is consumed, long before you can make it. Going back in reveals a vast expanse of nothing. Literally. I kinda had that in mind get it? for this next part, which was perfect]

**Upon entering, remnants of metaphysical structures lay on the floor, but not much else. Entering the psyche of Nuax has impaired the regeneration, causing this void to be lifeless**

\*a torch (or whatever you wish to call a flashlight) materializes in my hand as I begin to venture further into Xannari's mind, searching for something of an answer to this riddle (a way to defeat all of the Krynn at once)\*
**2 pieces of debris that look like a single part appear to slowly drift together**
\*stands and watches\*

**The two parts interconnect, becoming one object, followed by a deep noise of impact**

[Meant to symbolize regeneration, albeit impaired]
\*Without thinking it through, I fire a beam of light at the interconnected debris, realizing I am short on time\*
**Every other piece of debris stops, upon the destruction of the new part**
I decide I needed to hurry and find "the real Xannari" soon, realizing that only SHE would have the key to end the crisis outside the astral plane

**Another piece appears out of nowhere directly in front of you, and starts to slowly drift toward another one. The two pieces are identical to the previous ones, the only difference being they are a slightly different color**
